column3: Traffic Pattern Changes for Boardwalk at New Circle Rd:
column4: The lane configuration on the Boardwalk approach to New Circle Rd has changed.

column3: Traffic Pattern Changes for Boardwalk at New Circle Rd:
column4: Left turns to New Circle Rd from Boardwalk are now only permitted from the left lane.

column3: Traffic Pattern Changes for Boardwalk at New Circle Rd:
column4: Use added caution while traffic adjusts to the new pattern.
